text: Francisco Robles García (May 5, 1811 - March 2, 1893) was an Ecuadorian politician. He was President of Ecuador from October 16, 1856, to September 17, 1859. Robles was born on May 5, 1811, in Guayaquil, Royal Audience of Quito, Ecuador. He was married to Carmen Santistevan Avilés. Robles died on March 2, 1893, in Guayaquil, Ecuador from heart failure, aged 81. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1811 births Category:1893 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil
title: Francisco Robles
